TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDsa extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDsa Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: Provides an abstract base class that encapsulates the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that encapsulates the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可做為抽象基底類別衍生。This class serves as the abstract base class for derivations.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自的類別會呼叫這個建構函式類別。This constructor is called by classes that derive from the class. 類別是目前支援的唯一實作[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The class is the only implementation currently supported by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 您可能會提供您自己的自訂實作。You may provide your own custom implementation.

span.span: The name of an ECDSA implementation.

param.span: The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]: \- "ECDsa" \- "ECDsaCng" \- "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng" You can also provide the name of a custom ECDSA implementation.

span.span: The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]: \- "ECDsa" \- "ECDsaCng" \- "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng" You can also provide the name of a custom ECDSA implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要開發自己的實作物件，您可以使用方法多載來建立自訂`algorithm`字串，指定您的實作。If you develop your own implementation of an object, you can use the method overload to create a custom `algorithm` string that specifies your implementation. 如果您指定的自訂值`algorithm`參數，物件將會使用它來判斷是否可以建立 ECDSA 物件。If you specify a custom value for the `algorithm` parameter, the object will use it to determine whether an ECDSA object can be created.

Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性繼承自基底類別。This property is inherited from the base class. 橢圓曲線數位簽章演算法 (ECDSA) 用於數位簽章產生作業;未使用的金鑰衍生因此，這個屬性會傳回`null`。The Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) is used for digital signature generation; it is not used for key derivation Therefore, this property returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽章是第一次使用的公開金鑰來解密和驗證的雜湊值比較。The signature is first decrypted by using the public key, and then compared to the hash value for verification.
